 2003-14032003-09-19ND,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Defence Act
PrecisAmendments to the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES which revise Article 15.071 (Voluntary Release After Receiving a Recruitment Allowance) by adding a new cross-reference to the compensation and Benefits Instructions for the Canadian Forces.
